Letter Collector Rosalia:

I can exchange two of your letters for one of these in a random order: A, G, R, E, L, N, C, O, M, I. By the way, if you have rare letters S, H t the figure II, then for exchange only one letter or figure is enough.

In addition, when exchanging, you can get the same letter or number that you gave to me. Then how lucky ... Click on the button below when you're ready!
